statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas WHERE area_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT area_name, area_description FROM environmental_areas WHERE area_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT area_id, ST_AsText(area_location) AS location FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_location FROM environmental_areas WHERE area_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY area_name ASC, area_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas WHERE area_name LIKE '%forest%' AND ST_DWithin(area_location, ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-75.1652 39.9526)'), 10000) ORDER BY area_id DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT area_id, area_name, ST_AsText(area_location), area_description FROM environmental_areas WHERE ST_DWithin(area_location, ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-122.4194 37.7749)'), 5000) ORDER BY area_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas WHERE area_description ILIKE '%river%' AND ST_Distance(area_location, ST_GeographyFromText('POINT(-90.0715 29.9511)')) < 2000 ORDER BY area_name DESC, area_id ASC;

SELECT area_name, ST_X(area_location) AS longitude, ST_Y(area_location) AS latitude, area_description FROM environmental_areas WHERE area_name IN ('National Park', 'Lake Reserve') ORDER BY area_name ASC, area_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM environmental_areas ORDER BY area_id DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM protected_species WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas WHERE latitude > 30.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM protected_species WHERE habitat_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas WHERE area_name = 'Forest';
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM environmental_areas WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM protected_species WHERE habitat_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, area_name FROM protected_species JOIN environmental_areas ON protected_species.area_id = environmental_areas.area_id;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT area_name, coordinates FROM environmental_areas WHERE protection_level > 3;
SELECT id, species_name, population_size FROM endangered_species ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_id FROM endangered_species WHERE population_size < 1000;
SELECT * FROM environmental_reports WHERE author_name = 'Jane Doe';
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas WHERE protection_level > 3
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM endangered_species WHERE population_size < 1000 ORDER BY species_name ASC
SELECT area_name, ST_AsText(coordinates) FROM environmental_areas WHERE ST_DWithin(coordinates, 'POINT(-122.335167 47.592286)', 1000)
SELECT author_name, report_date, report_details FROM environmental_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date DESC

SELECT ea.area_name, es.species_name, er.report_date FROM environmental_areas ea INNER JOIN endangered_species es ON ea.id = es.habitat_id INNER JOIN environmental_reports er ON ea.id = er.id WHERE es.population_size > 500 AND er.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY er.report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM protected_species WHERE endangered_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM monitoring_data ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM research_team WHERE team_size > 5;
SELECT * FROM environmental_areas;
SELECT area_name, longitude FROM environmental_areas WHERE latitude < 0;
SELECT team_name, area_name FROM research_team INNER JOIN environmental_areas ON research_team.area_id = environmental_areas.area_id;
SELECT observation_date, species_name, number_observed FROM monitoring_data ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat_type FROM protected_species WHERE endangered_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM areas;
SELECT area_name, latitude, longitude FROM areas ORDER BY latitude DESC;
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT country_name FROM countries WHERE country_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT species_name FROM species WHERE species_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM species WHERE species_name = 'Lion';
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM areas WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < 20;
SELECT region_name, COUNT(*) FROM regions GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT country_name FROM countries ORDER BY country_name DESC;
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name FROM habitats WHERE habitat_id IN (1, 3, 5);
